remarks: Composition in the category of sets.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 3-Jan-2017.)
statement:
setcbas.c $e |- C = ( SetCat ` U ) $.
setcbas.u $e |- ( ph -> U e. V ) $.
setcco.o $e |- .x. = ( comp ` C ) $.
setcco.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. U ) $.
setcco.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. U ) $.
setcco.z $e |- ( ph -> Z e. U ) $.
setcco.f $e |- ( ph -> F : X --> Y ) $.
setcco.g $e |- ( ph -> G : Y --> Z ) $.
setcco $p |- ( ph -> ( G ( <. X , Y >. .x. Z ) F ) = ( G o. F ) ) $.
